com.teamonehundred.pixelboat

Class SceneMainGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.SceneMainGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Scene

    public class SceneMainGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Scene
    Represents the Main Game Scene for when the boat race starts.

      • update

        public int update(float deltaTime)
        Calls main runStep method for BoatRace which is repeatedly called for updating the game state.

        The BoatRace runStep method checks for started or finished boats in a leg, calls update methods for the movements for player boat and AI boats obstacles as well as checking for collisions.

        Specified by:
        update in interface Scene
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - The time between the start of the previous and the start of the current update
        Returns:
        returns an integer which is the scene_id of which screen is next (either this screen still or another)

        Specified by:

        height - Integer height to be resized to
